Content:: Lionel Jayatilleke (July 24, 1924 - September 1988) was a Sri Lankan politician. He was elected for Kuliyapitiya in the 8th parliamentary election in 1977.[1] He was assassinated, allegedly by the extremist Sinhalese group the Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna (People's Liberation Front) for his party's support of the Indo-Sri Lanka Accord.[2]  This article about a politician from North Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Lionel Jayatilleke - Wikipedia
